item.title: Objectaction error
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

  • if the objects x coords does not equal 269 or objects y coords does not equal 734

  • then end if statement

  • If the current player is not a subscriber

  • then end this if statement

  • else

  • send message to player “Only full Donators are allowed to use this gate”

  • break the current loop we are in

  • exce doGate method

  • if the currectplayers y coords is lesser than or equal to 734

  • then teleport the player to 267, 738

  • break the currect loop we are in.

Now you tell me what dosen’t sound right?

item.title: Objectaction error
item.dc:creator: @masterpowers masterpowers
item.description:
@masterpowers wrote:

trying to add a gate that requires to be subbed to enter heres error hopefully someone can help

ObjectAction.java:519: local variable player is accessed from within inner class; needs to be declared final [javac] if (!player.isSubscriber()) { [javac] ^

heres the code:

if (object.getX() != 267 || object.getY() != 734) { return; } if (!player.isSubscriber()) { return; } else { owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("Only full Donators are allowed to use this gate"); break; } doGate(); if (owner.getY() <= 734) { owner.teleport(267, 735, false); } break;

Read full topic
